idea:
ProStocks, a Sunlight Broking LLP venture, is a leading online brokerage firm allowing customers to invest and trade in stocks listed in Indian Stock Market. Customers can trade at BSE and NSE in segments including Equity Cash (Intraday and Delivery), Equity Derivatives (Futures and Options), Currency Derivatives (Futures and Options) and Depository Services. We intend to start Mutual Fund Services soon.
We provide the trading services at a very low brokerage fee in comparison to the traditional brokers. The average customer saves between 60% to 99% brokerage with us. We are able to offer services at a lower fee because of efficiently managing our expenses and upfront investment in technology to reduce the cost of transactions as volume increases. We are an online broker and do not have overheads like branches, RMs, expensive advertisement etc.
We are registered broker/member of BSE (Membership ID: 6635), NSE (Membership ID: 90084 Web | Pdf) and depository participant of CDSL. We are SEBI registered Stock Broker (SEBI Registration no.: INZ000048660) and Depository Participant (SEBI Registration no.: IN-DP-280-2016).ProStocks India's True Flat Fee Online Stock Broker
name: ProStocks

idea:
The main object of FHPL was to bring innovative pharmaceuticals & nutraceuticals products that will help people to Live Life to the Fullest, based on unique ingredients that are developed by companies in the developed world.
However, considering the start-up stage, company wanted to adapt an asset-light model, yet interesting to build up a long term business, on the back of unique products and global exposure.  
Today, Fullife, through its subsidiaries, are selling their products in India and in 21 other countries on B2B basis and at the same time are in the process of creating a remarkable brand in the business of sports nutrition product in India.  
FHPL acquired a Swiss company Novelty Pharma GDD SA in 2011, and thus acquired Effervescent Technology that has now become a back-bone of company’s products and its identity today as an Effervescent Specialist company in Indian Pharma industry.
Except one product, all the products that are introduced by Fullife in India are “First time in India” and have generated interest by several Pharma companies.
name: FULLIFE HEALTHCARE PVT LTD

idea: Mobile application available on android and ios, delivering fruits, vegetables, water jar, news paper and magazines, milk and daily needs in western mumbai areas
name: Pay2baba grocery expert

idea:
Omnificent Technologies Pvt. Ltd is an ISO 9000 Company established in the year 2016-2017 with aim to develop Products and Solutions for Transit / Mobility.


Company started developing Products for Online Ticketing and Payment system for City and State Transport to be deployed under various Smart City Initiatives.


Quickly realizing that to penetrate the market and establishing new concept and products it was necessary to start servicing the existing deployed products. This was low hanging oppotunity as no Indian OEM was keen to provide last mast servicing being painful job.


Company is currently executing Servicing and Operations of Two large states of India. Company is looking to provide complete Integrated Online Solution for Transport


Company also has Manufacturing Unit at Vasai to support development and manufacturing of Hardware requirements.
name: Omnificent Technologies Pvt. Ltd
